title: Sustainable Design Education: Professional Identity Formation through Non-Human-Centered Self-Narratives

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design theory, sustainability concepts, and basic VR device operation skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment exploring relationships with non-human elements (nature, technology, social systems), utilizing learners' personal devices under a BYOD policy

learning_goals: Learners can document their design practice processes from a non-human-centered perspective in three or more narrative formats
Learners can design and execute projects analyzing the interconnections between human and non-human elements in VR simulation environments
Learners can systematically integrate sustainability elements into the formation of design expertise through self-reflection activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
